mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAL_BOARD_TBL VALUES(SEQ_C_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{cBoardTitle}, #{cBoardContent}, #{cBoardFileName}, #{cBoardFileRename}, #{cBoardFilePath}, #{cBoardFileLength}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{cBoardWriter}, #{chalNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL WHERE C_BOARD_WRITER = #{ cBoardWriter } AND CHAL_NO = #{chalNo}
SELECT * FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL WHERE C_BOARD_NO IN (SELECT C_BOARD_NO FROM CHAL_LIKE_TBL WHERE USER_ID = #{ userId })
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL CB LEFT JOIN USER_TBL U ON CB.C_BOARD_WRITER = U.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId }
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL CB INNER JOIN CHAL_TBL C ON CB.CHAL_NO = C.CHAL_NO WHERE C.CHAL_USER_ID = 'admin' AND CB.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId }
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL CB INNER JOIN CHAL_TBL C ON CB.CHAL_NO = C.CHAL_NO WHERE C.CHAL_USER_ID != 'admin' AND CB.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId }
SELECT DISTINCT COUNT(*) FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL CB INNER JOIN CHAL_TBL C ON CB.CHAL_NO = C.CHAL_NO WHERE C.CHAL_USER_ID = 'admin' AND CB.C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId } AND C.CHAL_FINISH = 'Y'
SELECT DISTINCT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM C_BOARD_DATE) AS year, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM C_BOARD_DATE) AS month, EXTRACT(DAY FROM C_BOARD_DATE) AS day FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL WHERE C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId }
SELECT * FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL WHERE C_BOARD_NO = #{ cBoardNo }

SELECT CHAL_NO, COUNT(*) AS BOARD_COUNT FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL GROUP BY CHAL_NO UNION SELECT CHAL_NO, NVL(C_BOARD_NO,0) FROM CHAL_TBL LEFT JOIN CHAL_BOARD_TBL USING(CHAL_NO) WHERE C_BOARD_NO IS NULL ORDER BY 1

SELECT C_BOARD_NO, NVL(SUM(LIKE_COUNT), 0) AS C_BOARD_LIKE_COUNT FROM ( SELECT C_BOARD_NO, NULL AS LIKE_COUNT FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL UNION ALL SELECT C_BOARD_NO, COUNT(*) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM CHAL_LIKE_TBL GROUP BY C_BOARD_NO ) CombinedData GROUP BY C_BOARD_NO
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM CHAL_BOARD_TBL WHERE C_BOARD_WRITER = #{userId} ORDER BY C_BOARD_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
